meta.description: Character State Templates - 25 states per character including 5-stage transformation

idle.name: Idle/Standby
idle.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode idle stance, {color_detail}, {features}, relaxed standing pose, arms resting at sides, neutral pleasant expression, {style}, waiting patiently, at ease posture, calm and ready, clean studio background, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
idle.game_usage: Default state when character is available in hangar
idle.notes: Default idle state for UI - character ready for selection

in_flight.name: In Flight
in_flight.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, vehicle mode airplane, flying fast through sky, {color_detail}, {features}, dynamic flight motion, wings tilted slightly, speeding through blue sky with scattered white clouds, speed lines effect, determined focused expression, {style}, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
in_flight.game_usage: Displayed during active mission flight sequence
in_flight.notes: During mission flight animation - high energy

landing.name: Landing
landing.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, vehicle mode airplane landing, {color_detail}, {features}, descending approach pose, landing gear extended, nose slightly up, approaching runway, slowing down motion, {style}, arrival at destination, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
landing.game_usage: Shown when character arrives at mission destination

takeoff.name: Takeoff
takeoff.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, vehicle mode airplane taking off, {color_detail}, {features}, dramatic upward angle launch pose, engines blazing with thrust flames, lifting off from runway, nose pointing up to sky, dynamic powerful takeoff motion, speed blur effect, {style}, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
takeoff.notes: Dramatic takeoff moment - high energy launch

diving.name: Diving
diving.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, vehicle mode airplane diving down, {color_detail}, {features}, dramatic steep dive angle, nose pointing down, high speed descent, motion blur streaks, intense focused expression, rushing wind effect, {style}, action packed dynamic pose, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
diving.game_usage: Fast descent or rescue dive sequences
diving.notes: Exciting diving action - urgent rescue feel

hovering.name: Hovering
hovering.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, vehicle mode airplane hovering in mid-air, {color_detail}, {features}, stable floating position, propellers or jets visible with motion blur, stationary in sky, looking around observing, {style}, calm hovering pose, slight tilt, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

running.name: Running
running.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode running fast, {color_detail}, {features}, dynamic sprint pose mid-stride, arms pumping, legs in running motion, leaning forward momentum, speed lines behind, determined excited expression, {style}, energetic athletic pose, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
running.game_usage: Ground pursuit or rushing to help
running.notes: Fast running action in robot mode

celebrating.name: Celebrating
celebrating.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode celebrating victory, {color_detail}, {features}, arms raised high in triumph, joyful excited expression, wide smile, jumping celebratory pose, {style}, confetti particles around, sparkle effects, mission success celebration, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

working.name: Working/Helping
working.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode actively helping, {color_detail}, {features}, focused determined expression, hands in action pose, leaning forward engaged stance, {style}, problem-solving posture, helpful gesture, concentration, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

tired.name: Tired/Resting
tired.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode tired exhausted pose, {color_detail}, {features}, droopy tired expression, slightly slumped posture, eyes half-closed, {style}, needing rest, low energy pose, worn out but friendly, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
tired.game_usage: When character energy is low and needs rest
tired.notes: Low energy state - needs repair kit or rest

transform_stage_1.name: Transform Stage 1 - Initiate
transform_stage_1.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, transformation beginning, still mostly vehicle airplane mode, {color_detail}, {features}, slight body panels starting to shift, initial transformation glow appearing, energy building up, determined expression, {style}, transformation initiation, glowing energy aura starting, {base_style}, {quality}

transform_stage_2.name: Transform Stage 2 - Unfold
transform_stage_2.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, transformation in progress, wings starting to fold back, front section lifting, {color_detail}, {features}, mechanical parts visible, legs beginning to extend from body, arms starting to form, {style}, bright transformation energy, glowing joints, dynamic pose, {base_style}, {quality}

transform_stage_3.name: Transform Stage 3 - Midpoint
transform_stage_3.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, mid-transformation peak moment, half airplane half robot, {color_detail}, {features}, body vertical, wings becoming backpack, arms fully deploying, legs extending downward, {style}, maximum transformation energy, bright glowing effects, dramatic dynamic pose, equal parts vehicle and robot, {base_style}, {quality}

transform_stage_4.name: Transform Stage 4 - Forming
transform_stage_4.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, late transformation stage, mostly robot mode now, {color_detail}, {features}, robot body nearly complete, final adjustments happening, head fully visible, limbs nearly locked in place, {style}, transformation energy fading, robot form emerging, {base_style}, {quality}

transform_stage_5.name: Transform Stage 5 - Complete
transform_stage_5.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, transformation complete moment, full robot mode achieved, {color_detail}, {features}, heroic landing pose, transformation energy dissipating with sparkles, confident powerful stance, triumphant expression, {style}, final flash of transformation light, ready for action pose, {base_style}, {quality}

delivering.name: Delivering Package
delivering.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode carrying package, {color_detail}, {features}, holding colorful wrapped gift box or package, careful protective grip, happy helpful expression, {style}, delivery mission pose, package clearly visible, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

rescuing.name: Rescue Action
rescuing.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode rescue pose, {color_detail}, {features}, reaching out heroically, urgent determined expression, action rescue stance, {style}, dramatic rescue moment, heroic lighting, {base_style}, {quality}
rescuing.notes: Rescue action state - urgent hero moment

building.name: Construction Work
building.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode construction pose, {color_detail}, {features}, using tools or building something, focused working expression, mechanical arms in action, {style}, construction site atmosphere, building materials visible, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

digging.name: Digging/Mining
digging.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode digging pose, {color_detail}, {features}, drill or digging equipment active, underground or dirt environment, determined working expression, {style}, earth and rocks visible, mining action pose, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

patrolling.name: Patrol Duty
patrolling.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode patrol stance, {color_detail}, {features}, alert vigilant expression, scanning surroundings, official duty pose, {style}, law enforcement atmosphere, authoritative posture, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

caring_animals.name: Animal Care
caring_animals.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode gentle caring pose, {color_detail}, {features}, soft gentle expression, hands positioned to pet or help animal, nurturing posture, {style}, warm compassionate atmosphere, animal care setting, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

communicating.name: Communication
communicating.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode communication pose, {color_detail}, {features}, one hand near ear or head as if receiving transmission, alert listening expression, {style}, communication device glow effect, receiving message pose, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

damaged.name: Damaged/Hurt
damaged.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode showing damage, {color_detail}, {features}, some scratches and dents visible, slightly bent posture, determined but hurt expression, {style}, minor damage effects, sparks from damaged area, still standing strong, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

charging.name: Charging/Repairing
charging.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode in charging pose, {color_detail}, {features}, eyes closed peacefully, standing in charging station, energy flowing into body, glowing charging effect, {style}, repair and recharge atmosphere, energy restoration, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}

alert.name: Alert/Warning
alert.prompt_template: {trigger}, solo Super Wings character, robot mode high alert pose, {color_detail}, {features}, tense ready stance, wide alert eyes, sensing danger, {style}, warning atmosphere, red alert glow effect, defensive ready position, {base_style}, {lighting}, {quality}
